Reviews.Content: advice travelers visit hotel nice clean perfect location 5 min blue mosque front tramway istanbul cheapest transport staff friendly helpful specially cafer murat reception help city teach turkish coffee special thanks cooker mehmet delicious cake birthday love hotel visit april 2012

Reviews.Content: returned turkey stayed istanbul pleasent stay clean staff polite friendly esp breakfast appetising delight returning warm hotel freezing weather outside strongly recommend walk kudos

Reviews.Content: nice comfort location heart citythe staff ready help cafe staff remember absolutely stay visit

Reviews.Title: “Clean rooms, nice people”
Reviews.Author: AngelfishGirl
Reviews.Content: nice little hotel quiet street theres view blue mosque rooftop terrace true sultanahmet clean whistle decor white calm welcome respite istanbuls color bustle staff helpful pleasant friendly loved breakfast plentiful fresh granola bar yogurt dates figs nuts special treat isnt particularly exotic special makes quiet refreshing base marvelous exciting city youre five minute walk topkapi blue mosque block sea marmara advice view avoid 107 looks airconditioning unit noisy staircase

Reviews.Content: returned trip istanbul stayed hotel cant friendly warm hotel comfortable breakfasts huge choices overwhelming kudos chef hotel staff encountered turkey sad saying goodbye feel home 50 staying arranged birthday cake istanbul stay

Reviews.Title: “Tastefully done new hotel in Sultanahmet”

Reviews.Content: 21 yr male travelling 61 yr mother organised airport transfer hotel arriving late night driver helpful van decorated turkish rug curtains bowl turkish delight nice touches time visitors turkey idea arriving im itd easy lost location minutes walk sultanahmet square means touristy staff helpful breakfast pretty mix turkish western stuff mother western wasnt stick turkish stuff views rooftop terrace nice sit nicely staff helpful reception staff speak english staff attentive help bags etc hotel close taxi stand easy

Reviews.Content: stayed night hotel repeat time ill visit istambul perfect location close mosque breakfast vey nice assorted choices cook times check expected hello clean comfortable ellegant guy reception cafer attentive excellent professional forgot invoice sent email time visit istanbul hope months 10 10 100 recommendable

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights ideal location close major tourist attractions clean hotel friendly atmospehere hotel staff cooperative willing help manner guided istanbul abilities especially helpful special attention stay hotel booking manager till departure excellent experience

Reviews.Title: “Extremely good location.”
Reviews.Author: kwars0123
Reviews.Content: istanbul hotel midway aya sofia topkapi blue mosque realise couldnt placed faceless hotels world clean wellkept staff met friendly receptionists speak english eversmiling bellboy preferred italian weather breakfast terrace bigger roof magnificent view excellent proved wife congratulated choice

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great staff and good value”
Reviews.Author: Tim I
Reviews.Content: hotel superb location heart city 510 minutes easy walk main tourist attractions including blue mosque view bedroom window aya sofya topkapi palace etc staff helpful welcoming excellent english decor clean bright modern pretty perfectly adequate clean standard furniture shower bath air conditioning warmed quickly cold conditions visit contained minibar kettle teacoffee facilities sorely missed breakfast perfectly reasonable outstanding slightly eccentric selection dishes sweet turkish cakes olives cheese meats random hot dishes scrambled egg frankfurters peas coffee fresh fruit summary highly recommend staff location value money definitely book

Reviews.Title: “Excellent even after a 5 star major hotel”
Reviews.Author: Marlon M
Reviews.Content: clean beautiful decor excellent service attitude staff especially front desk comparison excellent service white name implies stays imagine experience heart action terrace views

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient location and cosy”
Reviews.Author: Stephanos T
Reviews.Content: hotel excellently located walking distance main tourist attractions city found staff reception particularly helpful especially selcuk helped lot getting finding restaurants etc clean nicely furnished overall hotel contributed stay istanbul enjoyable strongly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: evelyn c
Reviews.Content: staff excellent wonderfully helpful hotel located tourist easy walk quaint little hotel brand amenities lovely breakfast stay recommend peter evelyn australia sept 19th 2011

Reviews.Content: hotel hotel freshed cleaned especially personal feel hospitality special thank hotel manager ms helpful time looking contact guests course furnished greatful time time istanbul hotel
